content.html:
Connections


ProblemSolution
The monitor is blank.The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor ( ≡ 51).
Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.EVF EVF ONLY + SENSOR is selected for VIEW MODE SETTING: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different VIEW MODE SETTING option ( �� 14).
No picture or sound on TV.The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly ( �� 51). Input on the television is set to "TV": Set input to "HDMI" (□□ 51). The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the tele- vision to adjust the volume ( �� 5 1).
The computer does not recognize the camera.Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (□ 253).
FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.Check the option selected for CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable ( �� 266).

Notes
12
378

# Connections

| Problem | Solution |
| --- | --- |
| The monitor is blank. | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor ( ≡ 51). |
| Both the TV and camera monitor are blank. | EVF EVF ONLY + SENSOR is selected for VIEW MODE SETTING: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different VIEW MODE SETTING option ( �� 14). |
| No picture or sound on TV. | The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly ( �� 51). Input on the television is set to "TV": Set input to "HDMI" (□□ 51). The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the tele- vision to adjust the volume ( �� 5 1). |
| The computer does not recognize the camera. | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (□ 253). |
| FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera. | Check the option selected for CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable ( �� 266). |
